Name: When the Bird Glides Across the Sky
AttributesDescription: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
BgDescription: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.
ObtainedShowDescription: A piece of music performed by Ciaccona the bard.
